title: Greek honey cake
ingredients: ['125g plain flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon orange zest', '170g butter, room temperature', '150g caster sugar', '3 eggs', '60ml milk', '125g chopped walnuts', '200g caster sugar', '350g honey', '175ml water', '1 teaspoon lemon juice']
